badge_template_activities.title: Completed the AI Ethics for Nonprofit Train the Trainer session

Completed four (4) training sessions with at least 10 participants (eg. Nonprofits, impacted communities, students, partners), using NetHope's AI Ethics Nonprofit toolkit materials. Sessions must be at least 60 minutes long and include practical, hands-on segment.
